message: Hello Bob, I have a unique product that I think you might be interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I understand you're looking for a better price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $125.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I really like the product and I'm willing to make a serious offer.
I'm glad you're serious about the product, but $90 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to compromise at $115.
